title: Sharpu Gangu Lyrics Pugazh Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Pughaz Sharpu Gangu Song Lyrics
Singer(s): Vivek – Mervin, Vivek Siva & Mervin Solomon

Hey gammayila kallu
Mama cutting utta silakaapillu
Glassula saraku
En paera solli ulle yerakku
Quarter matter illa
Half thevayilla
Matta avanumna
Vangudu fulla
Mitta kisavulla
Maama missavulla
So so jolly dhan da pondicherry la

shaarpu gangu
Sarakka vaangu
Bodhai aana
Pothikinu aadu da ( 2 times)

Face-u fulla makeup pottu
Ponnu face book il pannudhu video chattu
Moonja paatha nallave illa
Andha shawlula mooduthu ennatha solla
Grakkiya vuttu dhinam ketkum dhan thuttu
Nee andha maari ponnungala oram dhaan kattu
Ponnaala vendhu nee ponaaka nondhu
Machan kai koduthu thookiduvaan ennaikum friendu

Madhichu vandhaaka madhipa kodupom da
Morachu paarthaaka moonja odaipom da
Enna aanalum piriya maatom da
Oore vandhaalum es aaga maatom da

shaarpu gangu
Sarakka vaangu
Bodhai aana
Pothikinu aadu da ( 2 times)

Hey gammayila kallu
Mama cutting utta silakaapillu
Glassula saraku
En paera solli ulle yerakku
Quarter matter illa
Half thevayilla
Matta avanumna
Vangudu fulla
Mitta kisavulla
Maama missavulla
So so jolly dhan da pondicherry la

shaarpu gangu

Bodhai aana
Pothikinu aadu da ( 3 times)
